title: AWS Multi-Region Infrastructure Framework
summary: Highly available AWS infrastructure deployed across multiple regions using Terraform. Features automated disaster recovery, monitoring, and compliance checks.

content.description:
# AWS Multi-Region Infrastructure Framework

A comprehensive framework for deploying and managing highly available AWS infrastructure across multiple regions.

## Features

- Multi-region deployment automation
- Disaster recovery procedures
- Compliance automation
- Infrastructure monitoring
- Cost optimization

## Technical Details

- AWS infrastructure management
- Multi-region configuration
- Automated failover
- Compliance scanning
- Cost analysis and optimization

## Implementation

The framework uses Terraform to manage AWS resources across multiple regions, implementing best practices for high availability and disaster recovery.
